sqlMap.select: select ID, FB_CODE, FB_TYPE, SUBSCRIBERS, SUBSCRIBER_TYPE, NETWORK_TYPE, FB_DATE, FB_CONTENT, DEADLINE, DISTRICT, WARDS, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, DEPT_PROCESS, RESPONSE_CONTENT, PROCESS_DATE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFY_DATE, BSC_RNC, CENTRAL_FB_ID, FB_USER, PROCESS_USER, FLEET_NO, FLEET_DATE, CAUSEDBY, VIP_CODE, FB_IBC, TEAM, DEPT_FB_ID, IS_DIEM_DEN, DVT_FEEDBACKED_DATE, SL_PHAN_ANH_LAI, TOA_DO_DE_XUAT from FB_PROCESS where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

update FB_PROCESS

where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
